name: Chips Royale
description:
Don't eat us!

Chips Royale is a little party game where you have to be the last one alive.

Have you ever wanted to be a crisp ? 
Yes... me neither.

1, 2, 3 or 4 players WOUUUUUHOUUUUUUUUUUU

  • You can only play the game with at least 2 controlers connected.
    what, you do NOT have 4 controlers in your room ?!
